title: On the Beautiful Sea: Eight Stories
description: On the Beautiful Sea is series of stories linked by a main character who is referred to, variously, as John, or Johnny, or J.B. Moving in reverse chronological order, each subsequent story reveals something more of the preceding ones. The Stories1. What's a Novena?2. match.com3. The Rachmaninoff Vocalise4. On the Beautiful Sea5. The Girl in the Park6. Funny Valentine7. Day Sleepers Welcome8. Dairy
author: Mark F
